item.title: ‘Dystopian’ toilets won’t give you loo roll unless you watch an advert first
item.description: If you don't want to watch an advert, you can pay 0.5 RMB - about 5p - to skip the ads.

item.title: People think China ‘intercepted a meteor or UFO’ after fireball video goes viral
item.description: That's almost certainly not what happened, but there's no official answer yet.

item.title: Bizarre ‘crash-proof’ plane covers itself in giant airbags to keep you safe
item.description: It's a 'promise of survival', according to the designers.

item.title: Putin’s quest for immortality including ‘viable’ head transplant surgery
item.description: There are numerous scientists 'working on developing technologies for whole-body transplantation', it's been claimed.

item.title: Sea creature called the ratfish uses teeth-covered rods on their foreheads to have sex
item.description: We feel sorry for his dentist.
